name: IFDB Spelunking 2
description:
An incomplete and moribund project, only released under the auspices of the Bring Out Your Dead jam. Following in the footsteps of Joey Jones' IFDB Spelunking, it records the experience of playing ten randomly-selected games from the Interactive Fiction Database, with added commentary and easter eggs.

If the browser version displays badly with itch.io, try playing it at my site or else downloading and running with an interpreter like Glulxe.

Thoughts on why I didn't finish this, and why I released it anyway, are over at my blog.
